__TOC__

This page keeps track of the current release status of the Ubuntu ARM Team

* Team focus is on image testing this and next week
* Banshee was finally dropped yesterday, there seems to be no fix in sight atm, bug is still being researched but we didnt want to risk the release
* There was one uboot upload to fix an overheating problem on OMAP 4460, so that oneiric images will work on the new panda platforms.
* The partman-uboot issue was not solved, we will release-note that guided partitioning creates to small boot partitions.

==== Image Status ====

* Desktop images build
* Server images are good 
* Netboot images are fine too
 
=== Specs ===

Progress:
* Entire http://people.canonical.com/~platform/workitems/oneiric/ubuntu-arm.html

=== Bugs ===

Open Bugs:

* Bug:820585 debian installer fails to add fixrtc to systems that do not have a battery backed RTC (arm)

Postponed:

* Bug:819900 package pool implementation needs to update apt
* Bug:819899 package pools need to correctly parse override info to create tasks
* Bug:806751 Boot partition on SD is too small on omap/omap4 with guided install
* Bug:857299 Banshee does not start

Bugs with SRU status:

* Bug:637947 [maverick] no sound devices on current Panda boards (accidentially there was a broken accepted fix into -updates, still being worked on)
* Bug:659754 [maverick] Universe & multiverse are not enabled on OMAP4 preinstalled image (fix was not liked by SRU team, re-upload in the works, fixed in natty)
* Bug:651302 [natty] No sound in omap3 (beagle, beagleXM)
* Bug:753071 [natty] DRM OMAP driver EDID detection
* Bug:758961 [natty] omap4 tty_mutex.c oops
* Bug:746023 No sound on omap4
* Bug:746133 video sync loss on omap4
* Bug:760035 missing deb-src entries in sources.list
* Bug:747229 console colors change in headless installs
